org.sat4j.pb

クラス ObjectiveFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sat4j.pb.ObjectiveFunction
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ObjectiveFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstraction for an Objective Function for Pseudo Boolean Optimization. May be generalized in the future to deal with other optimization functions.
    関連項目:
    直列化された形式

    • メソッドの詳細

      • calculateDegree

        public java.math.BigInteger calculateDegree(RandomAccessModel lazyModel)
        Compute the degree of the objective function using a full model.
        パラメータ:
        lazyModel - a solver that recently answered true to isSatisfiable()
        戻り値:
        the value of the objective function for the last model found be the solver.

      • calculateDegreeImplicant

        public java.math.BigInteger calculateDegreeImplicant(ISolver solver)
        Compute the degree of the objective function using a prime implicant. It is expected that the method IProblem.primeImplicant() has been called before calling that method.
        パラメータ:
        solver - a solver which recently answered true to isSatisfiable and on which the method primeImplicant() has been called.
        戻り値:
        関連項目:
        IProblem.primeImplicant()
